content.text:
The eosinophilic intraneuronal inclusion shown in the image will be strongly immunostained with <image 1>

A. tau
B. alpha synuclein
C. ubiquitin
D. both B and C

The eosinophilic intraneuronal inclusion shown in the image is most likely to be strongly immunostained with:

B. alpha synuclein
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
